00045 class CSwordPresenter : public CPresenter  {
00046    Q_OBJECT
00047 public: 
00048     enum features {
00049         strongNumbers = 0x000000010, /* Set if Strong's numbers are supported*/
00050         footnotes = 0x000000020, /* Set if footnotes are supported*/
00051         language = 0x000000040, /* Set if different languages are supported (for example in the key chooser)*/
00052         textColor = 0x000000080, /* Set if different text colors are supported*/
00053         highlightedVerseColor = 0x000000100, /* Set if different color for the highlighted verse are supported*/
00054         verseNumberColor = 0x000000200, /* Set if different colors for the versenumber are supported*/
00055         backgroundColor = 0x000000400, /* Set if different background colors are supported*/
00056         font = 0x000000800  /* Set if different fonts are supported*/
00057   };    
00058     enum events {
00059     strongNumbersChanged = strongNumbers,
00060     footnotesChanged = footnotes,
00061     languageChanged = language,
00062     textColorChanged = textColor,
00063     highlightedVerseColorChanged = highlightedVerseColor,
00064     verseNumberColorChanged = verseNumberColor,
00065     backgroundChanged = backgroundColor,
00066     fontChanged = font      
00067   };
00068 
00072     CSwordPresenter(ListCSwordModuleInfo useModules, CImportantClasses* importantClasses, QWidget *parent=0, const char *name=0);
00076   int getFeatures();
00080   virtual void refresh( const int events );
00084   ListCSwordModuleInfo& getModuleList();
00085 
00086 public slots: // Public slots
00090   virtual void lookup(const QString&);
00094   virtual QString caption();
00098   CKeyChooser* getKeyChooser() const;
00099 
00100 protected: // Protected methods
00104   void printKey(CSwordKey*, CSwordKey*, CSwordModuleInfo*);
00108   void refreshFeatures();
00109 
00110     KToolBar* m_mainToolBar;
00111     
00112     KPopupMenu* m_popup;
00113     KPopupMenu* m_savePopup;

00116         
00117     QPopupMenu* m_lexiconPopup;

00119     CHTMLWidget* m_htmlWidget;  
00120   CModuleChooserBar* m_moduleChooserBar;
00121   ListCSwordModuleInfo m_moduleList;
00122     CImportantClasses* m_important;
00123 
00124     QString m_highlightedVerse;
